page.title: 17Our 1985 Home
page.content: Although my family has lived in Hexhamshire for generations,{our new {bungalow}was only completed in {1985}.The foundations were dug in May 1984,and while the building was going on,my parents, my brother and I all lived in a caravan on the site.We were lucky that the winter was so mild. {Building}went fairly smoothly, but at times it was tiring, as we were doing some of the jobs ourselves. At one time I felt my mother would always have a paintbrush in her hand! The house is built of thermalite blocks, clad in local stone, some of which came from an old building on my grandfather's farm.It has many{energy {saving}features,{insulation}in the walls and loft, and under the floor,{double-glazing},and a boiler which can burn most fuels. We are very proud of our{1985}home! M.Stewart
